metadata.title: CVE-2024-26815 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/sched: taprio: proper TCA_TAPRIO_TC_ENTRY_INDEX checktaprio_parse_tc_entry() is not correctly checking TCA_TAPRIO_TC_ENTRY_INDEXattribute: int tc; // Signed value tc =nla_get_u32(tb[TCA_TAPRIO_TC_ENTRY_INDEX]); if (tc >= TC_QOPT_MAX_QUEUE) {NL_SET_ERR_MSG_MOD(extack, "TC entry index out of range"); return -ERANGE;} syzbot reported that it could fed arbitary negative values: UBSAN:shift-out-of-bounds in net/sched/sch_taprio.c:1722:18 shift exponent-2147418108 is negative CPU: 0 PID: 5066 Comm:
